newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan dollar ends up on labour fund news.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan dollar ends up on labour fund news.

text.p: The Taiwan dollar closed higher on Saturday after a cabinet panel on Friday approved a proposal to allow a T$188 billion state labour insurance fund to invest up to 30 percent of its holdings in the island's stock market.
The local unit ended at T$27.496 against Friday's T$27.509 close. Turnover through dealers was a modest US$86 million.

"Investors (believe) the labour fund news will trigger a stock market rally, which then will attract more foreign fund inflows to cause a Taiwan dollar appreciation," said one dealer. But he also noted firm resistance at T$27.48. For next week, a T$27.48-27.52 range was seen. -- James Peng (5080815)
